Introduction

Shin Seunghoon is a South Korean rapper, songwriter, and producer currently signed under LUK Factory. He is the former leader of the boy group NOIR and previously served as a member of ZEST.

As a solo artist, he performs under the stage name XXIN and debuted on November 9, 2020, with the digital single "Don't Touch Me."
